attributes.action: Stop TV Licence Fee & Stop funding the BBC
attributes.additional_details: In light of the Jimmy Savile and Rolf Harris case and I'm sure the many more to come it's about time this outdated corporation are stopped funded by the British viewing public. The BBC has failed the lives of so many young people who have been abused by these vile people who have been paid to do so by the BBC for which I do not what to help fund anymore!!!  There is clearly an issue at the BBC letting these people have rule within the corporate who knows what else goes on at this corrupt broadcaster. We should have the choice as to whether we want to contribute to BBC and not forces too!
